title: Conquering Debt (Part 1 of 2)
itunes:author: Guests: Brian and Cheri Lowe
itunes:summary:
Brian and Cherie Lowe discuss their lackadaisical attitude toward finances during their first nine years of marriage and the moment they realized with horror that they were in over $127,000 in debt. They share the sacrifices they made, the determination they developed, and the challenges they faced when paying off their debt. (Part 1 of 2)

Receive the book "Slaying the Debt Dragon" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-08-04?refcd=1453506&treatment=one-time-gift

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/conquering-debt-part-1-of-2/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
